column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Who was everyone 's favorite competitor , at any point in the competition ?
#Text=We really liked all the talent who made it to the finals .
#Text=They were all good , decent people , who had worked very hard to get where they were at that point in their lives .
#Text=We especially enjoyed all the other young people .
#Text=Our children travelled to New York City with the cloggers ( All That ) for The Today Show and had fun getting to know them better .
#Text=We liked the Millers , Taylor , and Bianca , and became good friends with David and Dania .
#Text=They were very sympathetic when Piers first said to " dump your mum , dad , and little brother . "
#Text=I think they were shocked when then Piers " attacked " them .
#Text=We decided that Piers went after the family acts : the Millers , Celtic Spring , and David and Dania ( who were a married couple . )
#Text=Who was your favourite judge ?
#Text=We actually liked all three judges .
#Text=Until we came before Piers in the semi-finals , we thought his judging was good and we mostly agreed with him .
#Text=We were shocked what he said to us , but happy that he could not find something specific to criticise .
#Text=He never said why we should " dump " the parents and the little brother .
#Text=After we had won the semi-finals , he said " You are brilliant ! "
#Text=We also very much liked David .
#Text=During the all the time of filming , we got to know him and we realized that he is different in real life than the show depicted him .
#Text=We were really touched and happy , and felt like we had won the million dollars , when at the end of the show , he presented us with a photo of himself that said : To Celtic Spring !
#Text=Your family values , your talent , your dedication is what me and all of America will remember .
#Text=See you on the big stage soon ! "

#Text=I think she loved our rendition of  Amazing Grace " !

column1: #Text=Celtic Spring has performed across both North America and Europe .
#Text=Where have audiences been the most responsive ?
#Text=Wherever we have performed , our audiences have loved Celtic Spring .
#Text=Music and dance are a universal language and speak to everyone .
#Text=One of our treasured memories of performing was when we performed in an Italian village for a really enthusiastic crowd with whom we could not speak .
#Text=But they loved our show and afterwards showered us with their treasures : a gold painted horseshoe , poems , books , etc ...
#Text=We were so grateful to be able to bring them joy through our music and dance .
#Text=We also had great fun performing at an all boys boarding school in England .

#Text=Afterwards they showed us all around their school , including the haunted corridors ( if felt like something our of Harry Potter ) and then shared their music with us : a jazz band and madrigals sung at dawn in the tower in the quad to welcome in May Day .
#Text=When we perform we think we are giving something special to our audiences but we are deeply moved by what we get back : happy faces , stories , friendships ...
